agreements.title: Clear Communication Standards
agreements.content:
We commit to:
• Clarifying expectations upfront for all projects
• Using specific examples when giving feedback
• Confirming understanding before ending discussions
• Responding to messages within 24 hours

agreements.title: Collaboration Principles
agreements.content:
Our collaboration commitments:
• Document handoffs clearly with acceptance criteria
• Pair program on complex features
• Share knowledge through weekly tech talks
• Celebrate team wins together

agreements.title: Decision Making Framework
agreements.content:
Decision principles:
• Use RACI matrix for major decisions
• Document decisions in shared wiki
• Allow 48-hour comment period for reversible decisions
• Escalate only after team discussion

agreements.title: Living Our Values
agreements.content:
We demonstrate our values by:
• Giving credit where due
• Speaking up when values are compromised
• Supporting diverse perspectives
• Acting with integrity even when no one is watching

agreements.title: Wellbeing Boundaries
agreements.content:
Wellbeing commitments:
• No meetings during lunch hours
• Respect off-hours unless critical
• Encourage use of PTO
• Regular workload check-ins
• Normalize saying 'no' to maintain quality

agreements.title: Conflict Resolution Process
agreements.content:
When conflicts arise:
1. Address directly with the person first
2. Focus on the issue, not the person
3. Seek to understand before being understood
4. Find win-win solutions
5. Involve mediator only if needed

agreements.title: Team Charter
agreements.content:
Our team charter:

Purpose: Deliver exceptional value through innovation and collaboration

Core Behaviors:
• Psychological safety is non-negotiable
• Continuous learning is expected
• Feedback is a gift
• We succeed or fail as a team

Meeting Norms:
• Cameras on for engagement
• One conversation at a time
• Start and end on time
• Action items assigned before closing
